section.para: To view summarized Sales history by Customer, select the "Summarized Sales History by Customer" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying summarized Sales history by Customer, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display summarized Sales history by Customer for all Product Categories.
Specify Product Category whose summarized Sales history by Customer you want to display.
Enter a Product Category pattern to select a range of Product Categories. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Select to display summarized Sales history by Customer for all Currencies.
Specify Currency whose summarized Sales history by Customer you want to display.
Enter a Currency pattern to select a range of Currencies. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Summarized Sales history by Customer generated on or after this date will be displayed.

Select to display summarized Sales history by Customer for all Sites.
Specify Site whose summarized Sales history by Customer you want to display.
